name: New Expansions
description: A Kovaalan vessel is blasting its way through the Alpha Quadrant, ignoring any attempt at peaceful communication. What are the Kovaalans after? Will you be able to stop their rampage?
rules:
-- In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Torres, O'Brien, Reno or crew with matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
-- Using the Xindi-Aquatic Cruiser, the Kovaalan Ship, or the NX-Class Ship will provide a bonus to hull.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Torres, O'Brien, or Reno

featured_crew.name: M'Benga
featured_crew.flavor: A talented medic with a secret, M’Benga reunites with Pike when he serves aboard the Enterprise.

action.name: Somewhere Out There is the Discovery I Need

featured_crew.name: O'Brien
featured_crew.flavor: O'Brien takes the conn of the Enterprise-D after Lieutenant Torres is frozen by Q.

featured_crew.name: Reno
featured_crew.flavor: Muddled with visions of the future, a flustered Jett Reno hurries to deliver the Time Crystal.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

action.name: I'm Going To Get This One

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

ship.name: NX-Class Ship
ship.flavor: The first Starfleet ships to be equipped with warp five engines, allowing exploration beyond neighboring star systems.

ship.name: Xindi-Aquatic Cruiser
ship.flavor: This sleek hydrodynamic starship is the largest and most advanced ship of any of the various Xindi species.

ship.name: Kovaalan Ship
ship.flavor: Small, nimble ships that attacked the Enterprise during its attempt to cut through a subspace corridor to reach the homeworld of the Xindi Council.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: A talented medic with a secret, M’Benga reunites with Pike when he serves aboard the Enterprise.

action.name: Somewhere Out There is the Discovery I Need

rewards.name: Reno
rewards.flavor: Muddled with visions of the future, a flustered Jett Reno hurries to deliver the Time Crystal.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

screens.text: "Captain, sensors indicate the ship blasting its way across the Alpha Quadrant is Kovaalan. The Delphic Expanse has been gone for centuries - they must be from a temporal anomaly!"
"Who cares where they came from? What matters is the destruction they're causing now! We need to put a stop to them before anyone else gets hurt."
"Captain, sensors indicate the ship blasting its way across the Alpha Quadrant is Kovaalan. The Delphic Expanse has been gone for centuries - they must be from a temporal anomaly!"
"Who cares where they came from? What matters is the destruction they're causing now! We need to put a stop to them before anyone else gets hurt."
"Captain, I have to hand it to you. You really put the heat on those Kovaalans. We actually managed to get through to them once. Fat lot of good it did us though. What they said made no sense!"
"They said we 'know what they want' and that we 'owe it to them' for Starfleet's role in destroying the Expanse. But we have no idea what they want and neither does anyone else at Starfleet."

responses.text: "Why do they want the time crystal?"
"What are you doing with a time crystal?"
"How did they find out you have the crystal?"

screens.text: "What about me, do I count as anyone else? Or am I just spore dust? Unfortunately, I do have an idea, but there's not a chance in Gre'thor they're getting this time crystal."

"They wanna use the crystal to return to the past and prevent the destruction of the Expanse. There're plenty of problems with that plan and the Kovaalans are well below the Pakleds on the list of factions I'd want messing with time."
"That's confidential Discovery business, Captain. If I told you, I'd have to feed you to Book's friend Molly."
"They scanned us and immediately hailed, demanding whatever was putting off all those chronitons. We eventually realized they meant the crystal."
"Captain, there's more than just the Alpha Quadrant at stake if they get this crystal. Can you buy us some time so we can get away?"
"Captain, I have to hand it to you. You really put the heat on those Kovaalans. We actually managed to get through to them once. Fat lot of good it did us though. What they said made no sense!"
"They said we 'know what they want' and that we 'owe it to them' for Starfleet's role in destroying the Expanse. But we have no idea what they want and neither does anyone else at Starfleet."

responses.text: "Why do they want the time crystal?"
"What are you doing with a time crystal?"
"How did they find out you have the crystal?"

screens.text: "What about me, do I count as anyone else? Or am I just spore dust? Unfortunately, I do have an idea, but there's not a chance in Gre'thor they're getting this time crystal."

"They wanna use the crystal to return to the past and prevent the destruction of the Expanse. There're plenty of problems with that plan and the Kovaalans are well below the Pakleds on the list of factions I'd want messing with time."
"That's confidential Discovery business, Captain. If I told you, I'd have to feed you to Book's friend Molly."
"They scanned us and immediately hailed, demanding whatever was putting off all those chronitons. We eventually realized they meant the crystal."
"Captain, there's more than just the Alpha Quadrant at stake if they get this crystal. Can you buy us some time so we can get away?"
